objects.specification: A large smooth rectangular floor surface with a neutral medium-gray color and a subtle matte finish, providing a sturdy and uniform base for all classroom furnishings.
A tall, flat vertical wall panel painted in a warm, pale sandstone tone with a fine plaster texture, forming the front boundary of the classroom.
A broad rear wall in a complementary light beige finish with a slight stucco effect, providing a neutral backdrop for displays.
A side wall with a soft warm gray-beige paint and a subtle matte finish, creating a calm frame for educational murals.
A matching side wall in a neutral sandstone hue with a delicate textured finish, ideal for mounting educational displays.
A large rectangular teaching board with a smooth matte dark green writing surface and thin silver aluminum frame, optimized for chalk or whiteboard markers.
A spacious teacher’s desk with a smooth laminated oak-tone surface, clean straight edges, and sturdy metal legs, designed for organization and visibility.
A comfortable teacher’s chair with a contoured dark brown wooden seat and backrest, supported by four slightly tapered legs.
A standard student desk with a smooth light wood-grain laminated top, gently rounded corners, and slender metal legs for a neat classroom look.
A standard student chair featuring a neutral walnut-tone seat and back with four straight legs, offering stable support.

A wall-mounted mural panel showcasing a lush prehistoric jungle scene with life-like dinosaur figures and vibrant foliage in a detailed painterly style.
A wall-mounted mural panel showcasing dynamic dinosaur silhouettes against a warm desert backdrop, rendered with high-contrast earth tones.
A glass-fronted display case with a sleek gold frame, housing curated dinosaur bone replicas on minimalist shelving.
A sturdy square pedestal with a smooth stone-gray finish, designed to elevate small exhibit items.
A detailed small dinosaur skull replica with realistic ivory-colored bone texture and subtle surface weathering.

A detailed small dinosaur femur bone replica with realistic ivory-colored bone texture and subtle surface weathering.

A detailed small dinosaur claw replica with realistic ivory-colored bone texture and subtle surface weathering.

A detailed small dinosaur tail vertebra replica with realistic ivory-colored bone texture and subtle surface weathering.
A large wall-mounted dinosaur skeleton display in off-white bone color, with articulated rib and vertebra details on a minimalist metal frame.
A hanging fabric banner printed with colorful dinosaur silhouettes and pale earth-tone patterns, adding vertical interest to the space.
A tall wooden bookcase with five evenly spaced shelves, painted in a warm mahogany tone and filled with assorted dinosaur reference books.
A low rectangular sandbox with natural-tone wood frame and fine textured sand inside, designed for hands-on fossil excavation activities.
A large printed world map highlighting prehistoric eras and dinosaur habitats, mounted on a thin black frame.
A recessed fluorescent ceiling light panel with frosted diffuser and slim white frame, emitting even soft white illumination.
